format: JavaScript (React test file, using Jest and Testing Library)
description: This file contains tests for a React application's frontend, specifically testing the App component behavior with mocked API interactions, including API calls, error handling, and UI updates.

classes.name: BackendUnavailableError
classes.description: Custom Error class representing backend unavailability, used in the mock API to simulate server errors.

methods.name: makeClient(overrides = {})
methods.description: Creates a mocked API client with default or overridden behaviors for testing note operations including list, create, update, and delete.
